activeKey.description: The key of the currently active tab panel
activeKey.description_zh: 当前激活 tab 面板的 key

animated.description: Whether or not to use animation to switch tabs, only for 'tabPosition="top"'
animated.description_zh: 是否使用动画切换 Tabs, 仅生效于 `tabPosition="top"`

centered.description: Tags are displayed in the center

defaultActiveKey.description: Initialize the key of the selected panel, if you do not set the activeKey
defaultActiveKey.description_zh: 初始化选中面板的 key，如果没有设置 activeKey

hideAdd.description: Whether to hide the plus icon, which is valid when 'type="editable-card"'
hideAdd.description_zh: 是否隐藏加号图标，在 `type="editable-card"` 时有效

indicatorSize.description: Customize the length of the bar, which is the same width as the tab by default
indicatorSize.description_zh: 自定义指示条长度，默认与 tab 等宽

:renderTabBar.description: Replaces the TabBar for the secondary encapsulation of the label header
:renderTabBar.description_zh: 替换 TabBar，用于二次封装标签头

size.description_zh: 大小，提供 `large` `middle` 和 `small` 三种大小

:tabBarExtraContent.description_zh: tab bar 上额外的元素

tabPosition.description: The tabbed position can be 'top', 'right', 'bottom' left
tabPosition.description_zh: 页签位置，可选值有 `top` `right` `bottom` left

destroyInactiveTabPane.description: Whether or not to destroy the DOM structure when hidden
destroyInactiveTabPane.description_zh: 被隐藏时是否销毁 DOM 结构

type.description: The basic style of the tab, you can choose 'line', 'card', 'editable-card' type
type.description_zh: 页签的基本样式，可选 `line`、`card` `editable-card` 类型

events.name: onChange
events.description: Toggle the callback of the panel

events.name: onEdit
events.description: Callbacks for adding and removing tabs are valid when 'type="editable-card"'
events.description_zh: 新增和删除页签的回调，在 `type="editable-card"` 时有效

events.name: onTabClick
events.description: The callback on which the tab was clicked
